ThingDef.label: fake kurin tail
ThingDef.description: A fake Kurin tail made with cloth and a bit of metal. Although it will look and feel like a real tail, having one of these will throw off the wearer's balance, slightly reducing speed.

ThingDef.label: bionic kurin ear
ThingDef.description: A bionic prosthetic ear with a built-in neural sensor system makes it even more effective than a real ear.

ThingDef.label: bionic kurin tail
ThingDef.description: The bionic tail, which is hard to distinguish between real and fake, has a built-in neuro-assisted motor to help maintain balance, allowing the wearer to move more quickly.
